resources.string:
You will be able to avoid the sleep mode of the device by keeping this screen open. It means that your device will be able to handle messages from the network quickly.

Connect the power supply to this device.

Press Back button to exit.
Please specify password for the Form

Please load the attached html file in web browser. By submitting the HTML form, the registered Android device will send the Magic Packet.\nIf you want to unregister the device, run \"WakeOnLan GCM\" in your device and press \"Unregister\" button.
Registration is finished. Next step is to send a e-mail to you that contains the HTML form to push messages through the web browser to this device.
Unregistration is finished.\r\n\r\nNote that it might take a few minutes for the registration ID to be completed removed from the Google server.
Check the target entry, and enter the password that you set at the time of sending this form. By submitting this form, your device will send the Magic Packet.
"You'll be able to send the Magic Packet from this application remotely via web browser after the registration.""
This app only works in the Wi-Fi network that uses private IP address space.
Long press to show Privacy Policy
Please specify the name in at least one alphanumeric character
The name is already in use
The specified port number is out of range
Please specify a valid port number
Please specify a valid MAC address
All existing data will be overwritten. Are you sure you want to continue?
